# up

**Type Property**

The focus update is heading in the up direction.

## Declaration

```swift
static var up: UIFocusHeading { get }
```

## Constants

- **down**: The focus update is heading in the down direction.
- **left**: The focus update is heading in the left direction.
- **right**: The focus update is heading in the right direction.
- **next**: The focus update is heading to the next item.
- **previous**: The focus update is heading to the previous item.
- **first**: The focus update is heading to the first item.
- **last**: The focus update is heading to the last item.
